title: A. Crystal Ball Sequence
statement: Crystal ball sequence on hexagonal lattice is defined as follows: n-th element is the number of lattice points inside a hexagon with (n + 1) points on each side. The formula is Hn = 3·n·(n + 1) + 1. You are given n; calculate n-th element of the sequence.
inputSpecification: The only line of input contains an integer n (0 ≤ n ≤ 9).
outputSpecification: Output the n-th element of crystal ball sequence.
name: Crystal Ball Sequence
